attributes.action: For  the history on other countries to be a part of the curriculum
attributes.additional_details: I feel that yes we should learn about British history but we should also learn about other countries history so what we are more well rounded students.
attributes.background: The history curriculum especially in secondary schools is ONLY about British history and  the World Wars , nothing about the history of other countries.

rejection.details:
The history curriculum already aims to ensure that pupils "know and understand significant aspects of the history of the wider world", so we're not sure exactly what you'd like to change. 

You can find out more here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/239075/SECONDARY_national_curriculum_-_History.pdf
